data.title: About
data.meta_description: Ohio Northern University is a private university located in rural northwest Ohio. We provide students with hands-on experience, undergraduate research opportunities and strong relationships, and 96 percent of our graduates either receive a job or begin graduate school within six months of graduation.
data.text:
Ohio Northern University has been lauded as the best in the state, and among the best in the nation, for launching good students into great careers.

College rankings continue to recognize the high-quality and return on investment of an Ohio Northern educational experience. Outside sources confirm Ohio Northern University’s strong reputation and value:

• Ranked No. 2 in U.S. News & World Report’s Best Regional Colleges Midwest list for 2024, making us No. 1 in Ohio.

• Ranked No. 3, and first in Ohio, in U.S. News & World Report’s 2024 regional Best Value Schools.

• U.S. News and World Reports ranks our undergraduate engineering program No. 23 in the nation (non doctorate), and recognizes our electrical engineering program as the 12th best in the country.

• One of nation’s top schools in The Princeton Review’s annual college guide, The Best 389 Colleges: 2024 Edition.

• Washington Monthly’s “Best Bang for the Buck” recognition “of schools ranked according to how well they help non-wealthy students attain marketable degrees at affordable prices” ranks us No. 1 in Ohio and No. 12 in the Midwest.

• Ranked by career-guidance site Zippia as the most likely college or university in the state of Ohio (and third in the nation) to place its graduates into a job.

• Ranked by Forbes in its 2023 "America's Top Colleges".
